Title: Harvest of Redemption
Writer: Javier Chapa, Eddie Howell, Laura Perez
Actors: Vanessa Alvarado, Rosa Anzaldua, Arturo Ayala, Jon Boatwright
Plot: Harvest of Redemption was inspired by a true story which occurred in the Texas Rio Grande Valley in the 1920's. It is a coming of age story about a young Latino's struggle as he grows up ...
